GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an array of a specified article

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments for a specified article

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an object of a new comment based on request body, for a specified article

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of an updated article with updated vote value, based on integer value in request body object, for a specified article. vote should be incremented on vote currently on article
